cast.name: Patricia A. Robinson Patricia A. Robinson

this_title: A Day To Remember：Live in Ocala
introduction: A DAY TO REMEMBER has become one of the most talked about bands in the hardcore punk underground. They have toured the US non-stop and have answered the battle cry that ignited a movement?Victory Records is proud and extremely excited to release this special version of the band's groundbreaking 2007 release For Those Who Have Heart. This special package includes a full concert performance in the band's home-town of Ocala, FL as well as tons bonus footage and their music videos for the Plot To Bomb The Panhandle?and Shot In The Dark.?Also, hear the band's crushing rendition of Kelly Clarkson's hit since U Been Gone?as well as 3 re-recorded songs from their first record and a brand new studio track. It all adds up to one of the best packages by a band that is dominating everything in its path.
chinese_title: A Day To Remember：Live in Ocala
